name: The DOOM
description:
A game made for the Pizza Jam 2019 THEME

Make a game based on the name of one of these level sequences and SAY WHICH ONE IN YOUR DESCRIPTION! http://info.sonicretro.org/List_of_Shadow_the_Hedgehog_Library_sequences

CHOICE

Fighting Spirit of Steel

BACKSTORY:

"Hello, Lieutenant G. Aime Jan. Welcome aboard the experimental tank THE D.O.O.M (Defensive Off-Road Optimizable Machine), A.K.A Heavy Dog. With the alien threat coming from the coastal town of Gorlami, you have to use the maximum power of the vehicle. Supplies will be released from time to time to help you in battle. Hold them as far as you can so we can evacuate the city!"

CONTROLS

AWSD / Arrows ►Move

Space►Shoot

P►Pause

POWER UPS

Activates a shield that protects against damage for 15 seconds

Activates additional tank acceleration for 15 seconds

Enable triple shot for 15 seconds

KNOWN ISSUES

Forcing the tank against some corners can result in the tank coming out of the arena. Damn aliens and their physics manipulator devices!
